thread.title: Ex-Bayern Munich star Sammy Kuffuor set to take charge of Kotoko today
thread.title_full: Ex-Bayern Munich star Sammy Kuffuor set to take charge of Kotoko today

title: Ex-Bayern Munich star Sammy Kuffuor set to take charge of Kotoko today
text:
10:40 CET Ex-Bayern Munich star Sammy Kuffuor set to take charge of Kotoko today - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Samuel Osei Kuffour who is expected to take charge of affairs of Kumasi Asante Kotoko today is assured of a good start financially as the club awaits its share of the transfer fees of ex-Kotoko defender, Baba Rahman, to Chelsea which is in the region of GHÂ¢250,000. 
The high-profile transfer of the gifted Black Stars left-back to Cheslea in a five-year deal fetched his German Bundesliga side, Augsburg, 14 million pounds (30 million euros). 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
